welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Noisy-le-Sec, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. Get ready to immerse yourself in the beauty of this town and enjoy all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, with seven sub-terminals serving various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 15 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Used for charter and seasonal flights

wifi.note: Free and unlimited access throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all commercial flights and serves as the primary point of entry for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services and amenities for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
